page.title: 18The Surgery, Bodenham
page.content: The Surgery, on the corner of Brockington road, is owned by the doctors.The building was opened in April 1984. Mrs Leviseur is practice manager and 14 people work on the premises including 3 receptionists, 4 Doctors and 2 Physiotherapists. The doctors - Dr. R Collins, Dr. Karilyn Collins, Dr. J Stokes and Dr. R Thompson work on a rota and book patients by appointment. Monday 8.30 - 11.00 a.m. Tuesday 9.00 - 11.00 a.m. Wednesday 4.00 - 6.00 p.m. Thursday 3.30 - 6.00 p.m. Friday 8.30 - 11.00 a.m. There is a dispensary at the surgery. The district nurse - Mrs Hill, has her telephone and office on the premises. Baby clinic is not held at the surgery, but at the village hall on the first Thursday of each month.
